chunk:
withSimplicity Hydra-Glow Serum

Brand: withSimplicity

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: *Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, *Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, *Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), *Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil, Tocopherol (Vitami

, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Oil, *Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, Jasminum Sambac
(Jasmine) Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil *Organic/Biologique

Directions: Great for acne prone skin. Apply 3-5 drops
to face and neck after cleansing, toning,
and moisturizing. Best used at night.

Warnings: contains fragrance allergens from

rance allergens from essential
oils | contient des allergènes parfumés
provenant d'huiles essentielles:
Limonene, Linalool, Citral, Geraniol, Benzyl
Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
